turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: need four small pizzas. One of them cheese, one of them pepperoni, one sausage and one buffalo chicken. All of them thin crust please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me confirm your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 small pizzas with thin crust, 1 cheese, 1 pepperoni, 1 sausage, 1 buffalo chicken, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up or having your pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes, just show them your receipt which will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
